justification: Correctly targets B’s ceiling-seeking style with a dual-threat QB, but overstates B’s ‘desperate’ QB need and ignores B’s reliance on rankings (Wright is out and low-tier). Proposal clashes with A’s injury-avoid stance by pursuing Q-tagged Josh Martin and with A’s preference for dual-threat QBs. Value is borderline for B to surrender a Tier 1 workhorse RB for a QB plus an injured, low-value TE. Rationale is brief and generic.
